alert.note: Alert for Morton (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:53PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHWESTERN MORTON COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM CDT... At 552 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles east of Hebron, or 24 miles south of Beulah, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Glen Ullin around 600 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
